title: Show HN: Markdown HN profiles at {user}.at.hn
dot: digraph HackerNewsBio{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box];Start[label="Start"];Step1[label="1. Opt-in: Paste \"{your username}.at.hn\" in 'about' section"];Step2[label="2. Visit: https://{username}.at.hn?refresh"];Step3[label="3. Handle Uppercase/Underscores"];SubStep1[label="3.1 Replace Uppercase: 'L' -> '0xNN'"];SubStep2[label="3.2 Replace Underscore: '_' -> '0x5f'"];Step4[label="4. Wait for caching (a couple minutes)"];Step5[label="5. Use markdown for styling"];Step6[label="6. Note: Outgoing links are 'rel=nofollow' unless >200 karma"];Example[label="Example: padolsey.at.hn"];End[label="End"];Start->Step1;Step1->Step2;Step2->Step3;Step3->SubStep1;Step3->SubStep2;Step3->Step4;Step4->Step5;Step5->Step6;Step6->Example;Example->End;}
